definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: Would you love me 'til the end?
“In the future,” he writes, hauntingly, “it will be difficult to die alone.”
sentences.chinese: 他鬼气森森的写到，“未来我们将很难孤独终老。”

sentences.english: I cannot die washing up a tea cup.
sentences.chinese: 我不能一生终老在洗茶杯上。

sentences.english: Keeping the same posture till next birth.
sentences.chinese: 我将保持同样的姿态直到终老，重生。

sentences.english: Newton stayed in chilly Cambridge, frustrated and forgotten…
sentences.chinese: 而牛顿则留在了寒冷的剑桥，失意终老。
祝我久居深海，孤独终老。

sentences.english: "In the future, " he writes, hauntingly, "it will be difficult to die alone. "
sentences.chinese: 他鬼气森森的写到，“未来我们将很难孤独终老。”

sentences.english: Would rather die alone, don't compromise.
sentences.chinese: 宁愿孤独终老，也不委屈求全。

sentences.english: Here she could stay for the rest of her life. Here she would be happy to die.
sentences.chinese: 她可以在这里度过余生，她愿意在这里终老。

sentences.english: You don't have to live in a great city your whole life to benefit from it.
sentences.chinese: 你不必在一个伟大城市终老就可撷取其精华。

sentences.english: You and me, Mr. Todd, we could be alone.
sentences.chinese: 你和我，陶德先生，我们孤独终老。

sentences.english: The unawakened one owns things and ends up being owned by them.
sentences.chinese: 未觉醒者拥有外物，并被外物占有而终老。

definition: to stay together/to rely on one another
homeless and miserable (idiom); to wander about in a desperate plight/to drift
to go back to one's native place and live in seclusion
solitary old man or woman/regular patron (at brothels)
to moisten with spittle (idiom); sharing meager resources/mutual help in humble circumstances
(literary) to slip/(of looks etc) to fade away/(of time) to slip away/to squander (time, opportunities)/to dillydally
faithful unto death (i.e. Confucian ban on widow remarrying)
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
to be all alone in the world
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
